title: London’s high land prices need ‘market adjustment’, says housing minister
description: Matthew Pennycook says far-reaching reform is needed to ‘get more volume out of the system’ and deliver more homes
content: Matthew Pennycook says far-reaching reform is needed to ‘get more volume out of the system’ and deliver more homes
